name: The Bleeding Tower Of Pisa
summary: Another piece of human history has been desecrated by those ruthless Hell-spawned monsters. The Bleeding Tower Of Pisa is an affront to everyone on Earth and they've called you in to set things right. First, you must find a way into the tower. Then clean up the mess, floor by floor.When you've collected the keys, and "taken out the trash," head to the basement for the final showdown. Remember: in the Bleeding Tower Of Pisa, blood will flow. Try not to let it be yours!
